title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2800.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2800.2 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) As used in this

Part: (1)

Applicant means a sponsor seeking
assistance pursuant to article XVII-A. (2)

Article XVII-A means article XVII-A of
the Private Housing Finance Law, as added by chapter 911 of the Laws of
1982. (3)

Commissioner means the

Commissioner of Housing and Community Renewal. (4)

Division means the New York State

Division of Housing and Community Renewal. (5)

FmHA means the Farmers Home

Administration of the United States Department of Agriculture. (6)

Sponsor means any applicant for
assistance under title V who is found by FmHA to be eligible under such law and
its regulations. (7)

Title V means
title V of the Housing Act of 1949 (42
U.S.C. section
1471
et seq.), as
amended. (b) Because the
assistance program established by article XVII-A and this Part is based upon, and operates in conjunction with, assistance from FmHA under title V, income
and certain other terms as used in this Part, the rental assistance contract, and other documents are used as defined in title V and FmHA's regulations. These definitions may differ from those used in the Private Housing Finance Law
or in other provisions of the division's regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2800.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
